body_html:
The error message is clear. Your weights are probably on a different GPU than the input to the network.

We're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body_text:
The error message is clear. Your weights are probably on a different GPU than the input to the network.
We're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body:
The error message is clear. Your weights are probably on a different GPU than the input to the network.

We're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](http://discuss.pytorch.org).
